attention3.ptxt: Before disassembling generator, be sure to put match marks at 1 locations (A (drive end frame (1) and coil assembly (2)) as shown in figure so that any possible mistake can be avoided.

s1.ptxt: Loosen rear end cover nut (1) and then remove rear end cover (2) from coil assembly.
Loosen screw (3) and then remove brush holder assembly (1) from coil assembly (2).
Remove coil assembly (1) from rotor (2) and then remove wave washer (3).
Hold rotor by using vise (2) and loosen pulley nut (6) and then remove pulley (1).

attention2.ptxt: When using vise, put clean cloth (3) and aluminium plate (5) between rotor (4) and vise (2) so as not to cause damage to rotor.

s1.ptxt: Insert rotor assembly to drive end frame and then install pulley (1).
Install pulley nut (6) and then tighten pulley nut.

attention2.ptxt: When using vise, put clean cloth (3) and aluminium plate (5) between rotor (4) and vise (2) so as not to cause damage to rotor.

s1.ptxt: Install wave washer (3) and coil assembly (2) to rotor (1).

attention3.ptxt: With marks on drive end frame and coil assembly marked before remove aligned to each other.

s1.ptxt: Install through bolt and then tighten through bolt (1).
Install brush holder assembly to coil assembly as follows.

s2.ptxt: Depress brush (1) and then while holding it depressed, and insert pin (2).
Install brush holder assembly (1) to coil assembly (2) and then tighten screw (3).

s1.ptxt: Install rear end cover (2) to coil assembly and tighten rear end cover nut (1) to specified torque.
Make sure that rotor turns smoothly.
